scripts.build.aws: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/aws-lambda/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.azure: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/azure-swa/vite.config.ts && touch dist/index.html && rm dist/app/index.html
scripts.build.cloudflare: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/cloudflare-pages/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.deno: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/deno/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.express: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/express/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.fastify: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/fastify/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.netlify: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/netlify-edge/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.node: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/node/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.preview: pnpm run build.client && vite build --minify=false --ssr custom-src/entry.preview.tsx
scripts.build.static: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/static/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.vercel-edge: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/vercel-edge/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.vercel-serverless: pnpm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/vercel-serverless/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.node-dev: vite build --mode development && vite build --ssr --mode development -c adapters/node/vite.config.ts
scripts.test.aws-offline.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.aws-offline.config.ts
scripts.test.aws-offline.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.aws-offline.config.ts
